get.description: Get a list of delegator rewards, stake and APY.

parameters.name: network
parameters.description: Network name.

parameters.name: startAt

parameters.name: finishAt

parameters.name: startNumber
parameters.description: Start number of the staking period.

parameters.name: finishNumber
parameters.description: Finish number of the staking period.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of resources that a single response page contains.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Number of resources to exclude from a response.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Delegator address in the required network.

parameters.name: addressType
parameters.description:
Delegator address type in the required network:

  • `deposit` available for the Ethereum network (used by default)
  • `withdrawal` available for the Ethereum network
  • `delegator` available for the Polygon, Solana, Cosmos, Near, and Sui networks (used by default)
  • `stake_account` available for the Solana
  • `nominator` available for the TON and Polkadot networks (used by default)
  • `nominator_reward_account` available for the Polkadot networks

parameters.name: validatorAddress
parameters.description: Validator address in the required network for this delegator.

parameters.name: groupBy
parameters.description:
Group the report data:

  • `stakingPeriod` aggregate the results by epoch
  • `day` aggregate the results by days
  • `all` aggregate the results over the entire period
.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: Exclude breakdown by `validator` from the data report.

rewardDestinationType.description:
Rewards destination type:

  • `staked` rewards will be sent to your stash account and added to your current bond (compounding rewards).
  • `stash` rewards will be sent to your stash account as transferable balance (not compounding rewards).
  • `controller` rewards will be sent to the controller account.
  • `account` rewards will be sent to any account you specify as transferable balance.
